Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑˆÑŒ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸ Ğ½ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ğ·-Ğ·Ğ° Ğ±Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ², ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ½Ğµ Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ñƒ. Ğ—Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ "Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶ĞµĞ»ÑĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ" ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ½ĞºÑƒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸.

Game provides high tension throughout a match as either a survivor or killer.

Pros:
- Multiple maps that are visually unique
- Different types of killers
- Interesting skill tree 

Cons:
- Sometimes Killer/Survivor would have OP items and skills
- Ranks reset in a short time period
- Survivors could exploit window hopping

Overall I had a fun time playing it.

Dead by daylight is a decent game but my main problem with it. is the broken match making system which is a joke. having people who have hundreds of hours compared to new killers doesn't make it really balanced at all. the devs need to rework the entire match making else it won't be fair at all to new players.

I very much enjoy this game, personally I would say this is the best game i've evr played, I really love the artwork and the perspective these characters have, it runs verry smooshly for me, Yes i would recommend this game for any and all gemers and even the horror fans out there, Good job to everyone taking a part in creating Dead By Daylight, props to you guys :)

This game is a pile piece of shit anymore, but here I am always coming back because itâ€™s additive.

Sure the game has got better since itâ€™s release but in a since it hasnâ€™t. The devs never know what they want to do with this game. You nerf Billy and Nurse but come out with these shitty buggy killers. They now are reworking maps where survivors canâ€™t even loop the killer just expect them to run in a straight line for them. They put these dumb effects on the screen to annoy you. In my opinion killers reactions are so slow oh look I hit a survivor let me sit here and wipe my weapon while they get a speed burst. So much is broken this game will never be balanced for both sides especially since this game relies on perks 

Rank donâ€™t mean nothing you can suck and get there like most just play the game a lot. Cross play is absolutely terrible Iâ€™m sick of getting in matches with console players that donâ€™t know what they are doing. Just in general survivors and killers are getting worse nobody knows what to do

Best way to gather salt if your interested in more locally sourced organic free range providers.

If you don't like horror games, don't buy this game
If you don't like quick time events, don't buy this game
If you don't like toxic behaviours, don't buy this game
If you don't like P2P connection for an online game, don't buy this game
If you don't like having your progress deleted, don't buy this game
If you don't like how the developers are running this game, don't buy this game
If you don't like wasting money on a barely functioning game, don't buy this game

Otherwise buy it

O jogo me supreendeu de uma forma bastante engrandecedora. Possui mecÃ¢nicas de jogo agradÃ¡veis e de fÃ¡cil absorÃ§Ã£o, bem como tras um gameplay diveritido e bastante intuitivo.
jugarlo con amigos lo hace muy entretenido y sus bugs son notablemente divertidos xd

This is a phenominal game that I very much enjoy, although it can be frustrating to face against killers who (mindlessly) facecamp you, I still respect the strategic form of camping in this game. I highly recommend playing with friends because sometimes random new players have zero idea what they are doing and overall fail to get to the end game. Whoever says Freddy is overpowered really needs to play the game more clearly to understand, he's stupidly easy to counter as long as you do your gens! Remember, it takes 7 full seconds for him to put you to sleep so be sure to save that hooked survivor during the end game because he won't be able to kill either of you even if you take a hit. As a killer I understand flashlights can be very annoying, just use lightborn, franklins demise, or even Overwhelming Presence to get rid of them, and use enduring or brutal strength to counter pallet loops. It's not difficult.... Anyways, definietly better than Friday The 13th by a long shot <3

In my nearly 100 hours of game time, i have had so much fun playing this game. i Enjoy being stealthy (and sometimes going out of my way to piss off the killer) as a survivor. I also love bringing out my anger on survivors that are pissing me off. Its especially fun to play with your friends or to just go and kill them, Overall i would recommend this game to anyone looking to have some fun.

This is a game that I can continue going back to. Are there some bugs and could it use a little more polish? Sure. That doesn't take away from the fact that it's a fun game to play as both survivor or killer.

The developers are constantly adding new killers (both of their own creation and licensed killers from classic horror films), as well as survivors, perks, and maps.

If you're looking for an asymmetrical multiplayer game, this is a good one to try.
Fun games to play, a bit hard for newbie like me  but still... 10/10 for the gameplay and the horror it brings to us
